t: Amazon.com : Peach Butter, 18 oz : Fruit Butters : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: This is so good we have been back for more, and have tried other jams and butters from Scherger's Kettle which were great, too. My dad loves peach butter, but Smucker's no longer offers it. We had tried to find peach butter before Christmas and ordered from Scherger's shortly after.

Amazon.com: Christmas Jam, 18 oz : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: Bought this "Christmas Jam" this fall from Scherger's Kettle in Shipshewana, IN. Just used this jam as the centers for my famous Thumbprint Cookies! What a DELICIOUS taste of the holidays...cranberry/strawberry jam with a hint of orange, cinnamon, cloves & allspice!
